com.sterlingcommerce.woodstock.callout

Interface ISCCallOutManager


  • public interface ISCCallOutManager
    This interface defines methods which the application has to implement if they are not using the database entities provided by platform. Framework provides a default implementation SCCallOutManagerDefaultImpl for this interface which makes use of the database. The interface has methods to get/set the callout metadata and the callout implementation metadata. sai praveen

      Returns the relative path to the directory that holds the implementation classes jars,third party jars etc for the callout.
      java.lang.String getCallOutName(java.lang.String callOutId)
      Returns the fully qualified class name of the callout interface for the callout.

      Returns the fully qualified name of the proxy class associated with the passed callout id.

      Returns if the input passed to each of the callout implementations can be modified or the same input needs to be passed to all implementations.
      boolean isThreaded(java.lang.String callOutId)
      Returns if each of the callout implementations needs to be executed in the same thread or in a separate thread callOutId unique identifier for a callOut Whether callout implementation should be executed in a separate thread or not
